General.Name: Jaya Trishindo Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Jaya Trishindo Tbk provides helicopter charter services in Indonesia. It engages in the trading, services, and air transportation rental. PT Jaya Trishindo Tbk was founded in 2010 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.
General.Address: Rukan Grand Aries Niaga, Jakarta, Indonesia, 11620
